```{r}
require(tidyverse)
require(mosaic)
require(lme4)
```

## load dataset
```{r}
load("olympics9.Rdata")
olympicsds <-  olympics9
```


## EDA
```{r}
olympicsds %>%
  filter(abs(tempdiff) > 10)

nrow(olympicsds)

ggplot(olympicsds, aes(x = tempdiff, y = medratio)) + geom_point()

```



```{r}
summary(lm(medratio ~ tempdiff + elevdiff, data = olympicsds))
summary(glmer(medratio ~ tempdiff + elevdiff + Year + (1|region), data = olympicsds))
```
